Interface ec.id.capabilities.TelepathyHandler

Implementing Classes:
PalaceTelepathyCapabilityImpl, TelepathyHandlerImpl
public abstract interface TelepathyHandler
extends Serializable
Handler interface for receiving telepathy. Classes implementing this interface will show telepathy received *somehow*. It's up to the implementing class to decide and show the telepathy in the appropriate manner when the method below is called via the TelepathyCapability.

Author:
Scott B. Lewis, slewis@communities.com
See Also:
TelepathyCapability, Telepathy, TelepathyImpl

Method Summary
void receiveTelepathy(ID sender, Speech speech)
          Receive some telepathy from the given ID.
 

Method Detail

receiveTelepathy

public void receiveTelepathy(ID sender,
                             Speech speech)
Receive some telepathy from the given ID.
Parameters:
identity - the ID of the sender
speech - the Speech sent to us by the sender
